00053 typedef struct BMBVHTree {
00054     BMEditMesh *em;
00055     BMesh *bm;
00056     BVHTree *tree;
00057     float epsilon;
00058     float maxdist; //for nearest point search
00059     float uv[2];
00060     
00061     /* stuff for topological vert search */
00062     BMVert *v, *curv;
00063     GHash *gh;
00064     float curw, curd;
00065     float co[3], (*cagecos)[3], (*cos)[3];
00066     int curtag, flag;
00067     
00068     Object *ob;
00069     Scene *scene;
00070 } BMBVHTree;
00071 
00072 static void cage_mapped_verts_callback(void *userData, int index, const float co[3],
00073                                        const float UNUSED(no_f[3]), const short UNUSED(no_s[3]))
00074 {
00075     void **data = userData;
00076     BMEditMesh *em = data[0];
00077     float (*cagecos)[3] = data[1];
00078     SmallHash *hash = data[2];
00079     
00080     if (index >= 0 && index < em->bm->totvert && !BLI_smallhash_haskey(hash, index)) {
00081         BLI_smallhash_insert(hash, index, NULL);
00082         copy_v3_v3(cagecos[index], co);
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 BMBVHTree *BMBVH_NewBVH(BMEditMesh *em, int flag, Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
00087 {
00088     BMBVHTree *tree = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*tree), "BMBVHTree");
00089     DerivedMesh *cage, *final;
00090     SmallHash shash;
00091     float cos[3][3], (*cagecos)[3] = NULL;
00092     int i;
00093     int tottri;
00094 
00095     /* when initializing cage verts, we only want the first cage coordinate for each vertex,
00096      * so that e.g. mirror or array use original vertex coordinates and not mirrored or duplicate */
00097     BLI_smallhash_init(&shash);
00098     
00099     BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(em);
00100 
00101     tree->ob = obedit;
00102     tree->scene = scene;
00103     tree->em = em;
00104     tree->bm = em->bm;
00105     tree->epsilon = FLT_EPSILON * 2.0f;
00106     tree->flag = flag;
00107 
00108     if (flag & (BMBVH_RESPECT_SELECT)) {
00109         tottri = 0;
00110         for (i = 0; i < em->tottri; i++) {
00111             if (BM_elem_flag_test(em->looptris[i][0]->f, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00112                 tottri++;
00113             }
00114         }
00115     }
00116     else if (flag & (BMBVH_RESPECT_HIDDEN)) {
00117         tottri = 0;
00118         for (i = 0; i < em->tottri; i++) {
00119             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(em->looptris[i][0]->f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00120                 tottri++;
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124     else {
00125         tottri = em->tottri;
00126     }
00127 
00128     tree->tree = BLI_bvhtree_new(tottri, tree->epsilon, 8, 8);
00129     
00130     if (flag & BMBVH_USE_CAGE) {
00131         BMIter iter;
00132         BMVert *v;
00133         void *data[3];
00134         
00135         tree->cos = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * em->bm->totvert, "bmbvh cos");
00136         BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
00137             BM_elem_index_set(v, i); /* set_inline */
00138             copy_v3_v3(tree->cos[i], v->co);
00139         }
00140         em->bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT;
00141 
00142 
00143         cage = editbmesh_get_derived_cage_and_final(scene, obedit, em, &final, CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH);
00144         cagecos = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * em->bm->totvert, "bmbvh cagecos");
00145         
00146         data[0] = em;
00147         data[1] = cagecos;
00148         data[2] = &shash;
00149         
00150         cage->foreachMappedVert(cage, cage_mapped_verts_callback, data);
00151     }
00152     
00153     tree->cagecos = cagecos;
00154     
00155     for (i = 0; i < em->tottri; i++) {
00156 
00157 
00158         if (flag & BMBVH_RESPECT_SELECT) {
00159             /* note, the arrays wont allign now! take care */
00160             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(em->looptris[i][0]->f, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00161                 continue;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         else if (flag & BMBVH_RESPECT_HIDDEN) {
00165             /* note, the arrays wont allign now! take care */
00166             if (BM_elem_flag_test(em->looptris[i][0]->f, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00167                 continue;
00168             }
00169         }
00170 
00171         if (flag & BMBVH_USE_CAGE) {
00172             copy_v3_v3(cos[0], cagecos[BM_elem_index_get(em->looptris[i][0]->v)]);
00173             copy_v3_v3(cos[1], cagecos[BM_elem_index_get(em->looptris[i][1]->v)]);
00174             copy_v3_v3(cos[2], cagecos[BM_elem_index_get(em->looptris[i][2]->v)]);
00175         }
00176         else {
00177             copy_v3_v3(cos[0], em->looptris[i][0]->v->co);
00178             copy_v3_v3(cos[1], em->looptris[i][1]->v->co);
00179             copy_v3_v3(cos[2], em->looptris[i][2]->v->co);
00180         }
00181 
00182         BLI_bvhtree_insert(tree->tree, i, (float *)cos, 3);
00183     }
00184     
00185     BLI_bvhtree_balance(tree->tree);
00186     BLI_smallhash_release(&shash);
00187     
00188     return tree;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void BMBVH_FreeBVH(BMBVHTree *tree)
00192 {
00193     BLI_bvhtree_free(tree->tree);
00194     
00195     if (tree->cagecos)
00196         MEM_freeN(tree->cagecos);
00197     if (tree->cos)
00198         MEM_freeN(tree->cos);
00199     
00200     MEM_freeN(tree);
00201 }

00203 /* taken from bvhutils.c */
00204 static float ray_tri_intersection(const BVHTreeRay *ray, const float UNUSED(m_dist), float *v0, 
00205                                   float *v1, float *v2, float *uv, float UNUSED(e))
00206 {
00207     float dist;
00208 
00209     if (isect_ray_tri_v3((float *)ray->origin, (float *)ray->direction, v0, v1, v2, &dist, uv)) {
00210         return dist;
00211     }
00212 
00213     return FLT_MAX;
00214 }
00215 
00216 static void raycallback(void *userdata, int index, const BVHTreeRay *ray, BVHTreeRayHit *hit)
00217 {
00218     BMBVHTree *tree = userdata;
00219     BMLoop **ls = tree->em->looptris[index];
00220     float dist, uv[2];
00221      
00222     if (!ls[0] || !ls[1] || !ls[2])
00223         return;
00224     
00225     dist = ray_tri_intersection(ray, hit->dist, ls[0]->v->co, ls[1]->v->co,
00226                                 ls[2]->v->co, uv, tree->epsilon);
00227     if (dist < hit->dist) {
00228         hit->dist = dist;
00229         hit->index = index;
00230         
00231         copy_v3_v3(hit->no, ls[0]->v->no);
00232 
00233         copy_v3_v3(hit->co, ray->direction);
00234         normalize_v3(hit->co);
00235         mul_v3_fl(hit->co, dist);
00236         add_v3_v3(hit->co, ray->origin);
00237         
00238         copy_v2_v2(tree->uv, uv);
00239     }
00240 }
00241 
00242 BMFace *BMBVH_RayCast(BMBVHTree *tree, float *co, float *dir, float *hitout, float *cagehit)
00243 {
00244     BVHTreeRayHit hit;
00245 
00246     hit.dist = FLT_MAX;
00247     hit.index = -1;
00248     
00249     tree->uv[0] = tree->uv[1] = 0.0f;
00250     
00251     BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(tree->tree, co, dir, 0.0f, &hit, raycallback, tree);
00252     if (hit.dist != FLT_MAX && hit.index != -1) {
00253         if (hitout) {
00254             if (tree->flag & BMBVH_RETURN_ORIG) {
00255                 BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00256                 float co[3];
00257                 int i;
00258                 
00259                 v1 = tree->em->looptris[hit.index][0]->v;
00260                 v2 = tree->em->looptris[hit.index][1]->v;
00261                 v3 = tree->em->looptris[hit.index][2]->v;
00262                 
00263                 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00264                     co[i] = v1->co[i] + ((v2->co[i] - v1->co[i]) * tree->uv[0]) +
00265                                         ((v3->co[i] - v1->co[i]) * tree->uv[1]);
00266                 }
00267                 copy_v3_v3(hitout, co);
00268             }
00269             else {
00270                 copy_v3_v3(hitout, hit.co);
00271             }
00272 
00273             if (cagehit)
00274                 copy_v3_v3(cagehit, hit.co);
00275         }
00276 
00277         return tree->em->looptris[hit.index][0]->f;
00278     }
00279 
00280     return NULL;
00281 }
00282 
00283 BVHTree *BMBVH_BVHTree(BMBVHTree *tree)
00284 {
00285     return tree->tree;
00286 }
00287 
00288 static void vertsearchcallback(void *userdata, int index, const float *UNUSED(co), BVHTreeNearest *hit)
00289 {
00290     BMBVHTree *tree = userdata;
00291     BMLoop **ls = tree->em->looptris[index];
00292     float dist, maxdist, v[3];
00293     int i;
00294 
00295     maxdist = tree->maxdist;
00296 
00297     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00298         sub_v3_v3v3(v, hit->co, ls[i]->v->co);
00299 
00300         dist = len_v3(v);
00301         if (dist < hit->dist && dist < maxdist) {
00302             copy_v3_v3(hit->co, ls[i]->v->co);
00303             copy_v3_v3(hit->no, ls[i]->v->no);
00304             hit->dist = dist;
00305             hit->index = index;
00306         }
00307     }
00308 }
00309 
00310 BMVert *BMBVH_FindClosestVert(BMBVHTree *tree, float *co, float maxdist)
00311 {
00312     BVHTreeNearest hit;
00313 
00314     copy_v3_v3(hit.co, co);
00315     hit.dist = maxdist * 5;
00316     hit.index = -1;
00317 
00318     tree->maxdist = maxdist;
00319 
00320     BLI_bvhtree_find_nearest(tree->tree, co, &hit, vertsearchcallback, tree);
00321     if (hit.dist != FLT_MAX && hit.index != -1) {
00322         BMLoop **ls = tree->em->looptris[hit.index];
00323         float dist, curdist = tree->maxdist, v[3];
00324         int cur = 0, i;
00325 
00326         maxdist = tree->maxdist;
00327 
00328         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00329             sub_v3_v3v3(v, hit.co, ls[i]->v->co);
00330 
00331             dist = len_v3(v);
00332             if (dist < curdist) {
00333                 cur = i;
00334                 curdist = dist;
00335             }
00336         }
00337 
00338         return ls[cur]->v;
00339     }
00340 
00341     return NULL;
00342 }

00345 #if 0
00346 static short winding(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
00347 /* is v3 to the right of (v1 - v2) ? With exception: v3 == v1 || v3 == v2 */
00348 {
00349     double inp;
00350 
00351     //inp = (v2[cox] - v1[cox]) * (v1[coy] - v3[coy]) + (v1[coy] - v2[coy]) * (v1[cox] - v3[cox]);
00352     inp = (v2[0] - v1[0]) * (v1[1] - v3[1]) + (v1[1] - v2[1]) * (v1[0] - v3[0]);
00353 
00354     if (inp < 0.0) {
00355         return 0;
00356     }
00357     else if (inp == 0) {
00358         if (v1[0] == v3[0] && v1[1] == v3[1]) return 0;
00359         if (v2[0] == v3[0] && v2[1] == v3[1]) return 0;
00360     }
00361     return 1;
00362 }

00372 static BMFace *edge_ray_cast(BMBVHTree *tree, float *co, float *dir, float *hitout, BMEdge *e)
00373 {
00374     BMFace *f = BMBVH_RayCast(tree, co, dir, hitout, NULL);
00375     
00376     if (f && BM_edge_in_face(f, e))
00377         return NULL;
00378 
00379     return f;
00380 }
00381 
00382 static void scale_point(float *c1, float *p, float s)
00383 {
00384     sub_v3_v3(c1, p);
00385     mul_v3_fl(c1, s);
00386     add_v3_v3(c1, p);
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 int BMBVH_EdgeVisible(BMBVHTree *tree, BMEdge *e, ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, Object *obedit)
00391 {
00392     BMFace *f;
00393     float co1[3], co2[3], co3[3], dir1[4], dir2[4], dir3[4];
00394     float origin[3], invmat[4][4];
00395     float epsilon = 0.01f; 
00396     float mval_f[2], end[3];
00397     
00398     if (!ar) {
00399         printf("error in BMBVH_EdgeVisible!\n");
00400         return 0;
00401     }
00402     
00403     mval_f[0] = ar->winx / 2.0f;
00404     mval_f[1] = ar->winy / 2.0f;
00405     ED_view3d_win_to_segment_clip(ar, v3d, mval_f, origin, end);
00406     
00407     invert_m4_m4(invmat, obedit->obmat);
00408     mul_m4_v3(invmat, origin);
00409 
00410     copy_v3_v3(co1, e->v1->co);
00411     add_v3_v3v3(co2, e->v1->co, e->v2->co);
00412     mul_v3_fl(co2, 0.5f);
00413     copy_v3_v3(co3, e->v2->co);
00414     
00415     scale_point(co1, co2, 0.99);
00416     scale_point(co3, co2, 0.99);
00417     
00418     /* ok, idea is to generate rays going from the camera origin to the 
00419      * three points on the edge (v1, mid, v2)*/
00420     sub_v3_v3v3(dir1, origin, co1);
00421     sub_v3_v3v3(dir2, origin, co2);
00422     sub_v3_v3v3(dir3, origin, co3);
00423     
00424     normalize_v3(dir1);
00425     normalize_v3(dir2);
00426     normalize_v3(dir3);
00427 
00428     mul_v3_fl(dir1, epsilon);
00429     mul_v3_fl(dir2, epsilon);
00430     mul_v3_fl(dir3, epsilon);
00431     
00432     /* offset coordinates slightly along view vectors, to avoid
00433      * hitting the faces that own the edge.*/
00434     add_v3_v3v3(co1, co1, dir1);
00435     add_v3_v3v3(co2, co2, dir2);
00436     add_v3_v3v3(co3, co3, dir3);
00437 
00438     normalize_v3(dir1);
00439     normalize_v3(dir2);
00440     normalize_v3(dir3);
00441 
00442     /* do three samplings: left, middle, right */
00443     f = edge_ray_cast(tree, co1, dir1, NULL, e);
00444     if (f && !edge_ray_cast(tree, co2, dir2, NULL, e))
00445         return 1;
00446     else if (f && !edge_ray_cast(tree, co3, dir3, NULL, e))
00447         return 1;
00448     else if (!f)
00449         return 1;
00450 
00451     return 0;
00452 }
